basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: Dental Operations Lead | Patient Care • Treatment Coordination • Insurance Management
basics.summary: Dental Operations Lead and former Registered Expanded Functions Dental Assistant with extensive experience in patient care, treatment coordination, insurance management, and front-office operations. Skilled in supervising teams, managing workflows, and optimizing practice performance. Adept at providing compassionate patient service, ensuring compliance with dental standards, and collaborating with dental teams to deliver exceptional care.

work.name: Gray Station Dental
work.position: Lead Dental Assistant / Front Office Coordinator
highlights: Supervised a 3-person team coordinating clinical and front-office operations across 6 treatment rooms
Provided superior patient service, scheduling, and insurance verification to ensure positive patient experiences
Managed treatment plan workflows, equipment installs, sterilization, and documentation compliance
Trained and guided staff on office procedures and workflows to optimize practice efficiency
Prepared impressions, articulated models, and assisted in laboratory-related tasks
Utilized Denstply Sirona's CEREC software to support both clinical and administrative workflows

work.name: Blue Ridge Family Dentistry
highlights: Obtained expanded functions licensure and performed restorative and preventive procedures under supervision
Designed and implemented the practice's treatment plan procedure from scratch to streamline patient care
Assisted dentists with procedures while maintaining patient comfort and safety
Coordinated patient schedules, insurance verification, and treatment follow-ups
Enhanced patient experience through education and clear communication

work.name: eAssist Dental Solutions
highlights: Managed dental insurance claims, prior authorizations, and patient billing inquiries
Worked directly with insurance providers to verify coverage and maximize reimbursement
Provided exceptional customer service to patients and dental offices, resolving insurance issues efficiently
Coordinated with dental office staff to ensure accurate billing and insurance coverage verification

work.name: Premier Dental Lab
highlights: Designed and fabricated fixed and removable dental prostheses using Dentsply inLab CAD/CAM software
Operated 3D printers and milling machines with high precision to produce accurate restorations
Maintained computer systems and networked lab devices to support dental workflows
Collaborated with office staff to ensure smooth workflow and timely patient service

work.name: Unbound Digital
highlights: Maintained office systems and technical infrastructure to ensure smooth daily operations
Trained staff and clients on software use, workflows, and compliance procedures
Leveraged data analysis to improve system performance and operational efficiency
Provided remote and in-person support, demonstrating problem-solving and attention to detail

projects.name: Case Study published in JDT magazine
projects.description: Wrote a case study for the JDT magazine published in 2018 detailing the process to create virtual tooth preparations and guides using Dentsply inLab CAD/CAM software.
